exercises.instruction: What would you say in the following situations? Record your answers and check them against the models.

exercise.description: Inform that you are married, and have two children.
exercise.answer: 結婚しています。そして、子供が二人います。

exercise.description: Tell your colleague that your father and mother live in Boston.
exercise.answer: 父と母はボストンに住んでいます。

exercise.description: Your colleague asked you to describe how your older sister looks. Tell him/her that she is thin and very tall.
exercise.answer: やせていて、とても背が高いです。
